程序包 frank.basis.app

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BaseActivity
    Activity基类，与业务逻辑无关
    BaseAppCompatActivity
    Activity基类，与业务逻辑无关
    BaseApplication
    所有应用启动入口（Application类）的基类，与业务逻辑无关
    BaseCache
    缓存基类，与业务逻辑无关 public AppCache getInstance() { if (null == instance) { synchronized (this) { if (null == instance) { Object object = RROUtil.restoreObject( AppConstants.CACHEDIR + this.getClass().getSimpleName()); if (object == null) { RROUtil.saveObject( AppConstants.CACHEDIR + this.getClass().getSimpleName(), object); } instance = (AppCache) object; } } } return instance; }
    BaseFragment
    Fragment的基类，与业务逻辑无关
    BaseFragmentActivity
    FragmentActivity基类，与业务逻辑无关
